name: Zombie Horde Dominator
description: You and your companions will be in a safe zone on an island, where you can teleport to zombie infested islands at any time. At this point, more and more powerful zombies will appear. You need to immediately set up defense facilities, build buildings, lay landmines, barbed wire, and use various crazy weapons to resist wave after wave of zombie waves. In the end, the situation will be very crazy and uncontrollable. After everyone dies, they will teleport back to the safe zone, Obtain large rewards based on the number of zombies killed, and use them to purchase various powerful weapons and building materials
